General.Name: Maven Income And Growth Vct 5 Plc
General.Description: Maven Income and Growth VCT 5 PLC is a venture capital trust fund specializes in growth capital investment. It investments in shares and securities in smaller, unquoted United Kingdom companies and AiM/PLUS companies which meet the criteria for VCT qualifying investments.
General.Address: Kintyre House, Glasgow, United Kingdom, G2 2LW
